name: HKWorkoutEvent
desc: An object representing an important event during a workout.

items.name: init(type: HKWorkoutEventType, dateInterval: DateInterval, metadata: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Instantiates and returns a new workout event with the specified type, date interval, and metadata.

items.name: var dateInterval: DateInterval
items.desc: The time and duration of the event.

items.name: var metadata: [String : Any]?
items.desc: The metadata associated with the workout event.

items.name: enum HKWorkoutEventType
items.desc: Constants that represent events occurring during a workout.
